movies.title: Watchmen
movies.plot: In a gritty and alternate 1985 the glory days of costumed vigilantes have been brought to a close by a government crackdown, but after one of the masked veterans is brutally murdered, an investigation into the killer is initiated. The reunited heroes set out to prevent their own destruction, but in doing so uncover a sinister plot that puts all of humanity in grave danger.

events.title: Jonathan Osterman is introduced to Janey Slater
a room full of people wearing disguises meet
"tonight, a Comedian died in New York"
Rorschach and the Nite Owl try to stop Ozymandias

movies.title: Superman
movies.plot: Mild-mannered Clark Kent works as a reporter at the Daily Planet alongside his crush, Lois Lane. Clark must summon his superhero alter-ego when the nefarious Lex Luthor launches a plan to take over the world.
movies.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 17 wins & 19 nominations.

movies.title: V for Vendetta
movies.plot: In a world in which Great Britain has become a fascist state, a masked vigilante known only as “V” conducts guerrilla warfare against the oppressive British government. When V rescues a young woman from the secret police, he finds in her an ally with whom he can continue his fight to free the people of Britain.

events.title: V blows up the Houses of Parliament, on Guy Fawkes Night

movies.title: Batman Returns
movies.plot: Having defeated the Joker, Batman now faces the Penguin—a warped and deformed individual who is intent on being accepted into Gotham society, with the help of Max Schreck, a crooked businessman, whom he coerces into helping him run for the position of Mayor of Gotham, while they both attempt to frame Batman in a different light. Batman must attempt to clear his name, all while also deciding just what must be done with the mysterious Catwoman slinking about.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 27 nominations.
